title: 89/565/EEC: Commission Decision of 16 October 1989 adjusting the boundaries of less-favoured areas, within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC, in France (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 16 October 1989
adjusting the boundaries of less-favoured areas, within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC, in France
(Only the French text is authentic)
(89/565/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas in France which is set out in the Annex to Directive 75/271/EEC is hereby amended as shown in the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 October 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 33.
(4) OJ No L 189, 9. 7. 1987, p. 35.
ANNEX
